Start time : 02/03/2022 11:00 UTC End time : 29/03/2022 22:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The purpose of this operation is to carry out verification work for the proper functioning of the servers.

All servers will be suspended tomorrow Tuesday, March 22, 2022.
Access to them will be unavailable
Update :All servers are now in rescue-pro or WinPE mode. All your data are now accessible
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Service impact : As we announced, we are closing SBG4 datacenter. We will reboot all the servers (located in SBG4 ==> racks 90Axx, 90Bxx, 90Cxx and 90Dxx) in rescue-pro or WinPE mode depending on your OS. A communication has been sent to you if your services are impacted. We thank you for your understanding
